description:
Naruto and Killer Bee face off against the masked man originally thought to be Madara Uchiha, in addition to the reanimated Jinchuriki. Naruto is shocked when he recognizes one of the Jinchuriki.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Maske, die nicht zerspringt, und eine geplatzte Seifenblase
The Unbreakable Mask and the Shattered Bubble
Un masque incassable et des bulles de savon
割れない仮面・割れたシャボン玉
